text: And Achaab spoke to Nabuthai, saying, Give me thy vineyard, and I will have it for a garden of herbs, for it is near my house: and I will give thee another vineyard better than it; or if 20. 2 Gr. it is pleasing before thee.it please thee, I will give thee money, the price of this thy vineyard, and I will have it for a garden of herbs.
